item.description:

item.title: Mediation requests explode in insurance
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
The mediator of insurance, responsible for settling disputes amicably, received nearly 15,000 requests in 2016. The problems mainly concerned auto insurance, home and insurance borrower. Individuals are turning more and more to the insurance mediator to amicably settle disputes with their insurers. Which avoids going to court. This trend increased significantly in 2016: mediation requests jumped by 53% (14,803 requests) […]

item.title: Mexico: discovery of a major oil and gas field
item.dc:creator: Yappo
item.description:
Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto announced Friday the discovery of an “important” oil and gas field in the state of Veracruz, in the east of the country.
